title: Ebert & Roeper - 02.10.08 - guest host A.O. Scott
description:
Ebert & Roeper  -  February 10th, 2007 - with guest host [url=http://movies.nytimes.com/ref/movies/reviews/author/rev_auth_scott/index.html]A.O. Scott[/url], film critic for The New York Times

---- New movies this week:
[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0770752/]Fool&#039;s Gold[/url]
[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0780536/]In Bruges[/url]
[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0844768/]Vince Vaughn&#039;s Wild West Comedy Show[/url]
[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0804492/]The Hottie and the Nottie[/url]
[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0494652/]Welcome Home Roscoe Jenkins[/url]

--- Next Week
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0489099/]Jumper[/url]
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0832266/]Definitely, Maybe[/url]

-------------------------------------------------
SPOILERS - The following list gives the thumbs up or thumbs down vote which the movies received.  (Scott - Roeper)
-------------------------------------------------

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0770752/]Fool&#039;s Gold[/url]  -  (way) down - (way) down
-- Matthew McConaughey - Kate Hudson - Donald Sutherland - Ray Winstone - Malcom-Jamal Warner - Alexis Dziena

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0780536/]In Bruges[/url]  -  (worth a visit) up - (big thumbs) up  -  "make an extra effort to see it"
-- Colin Farrell - Brendan Gleeson - Ralph Fiennes

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0844768/]Vince Vaughn&#039;s Wild West Comedy Show[/url]  -  up - up
-- documentary
-- Vince Vaughn

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0804492/]The Hottie and the Nottie[/url]  -  (huge thumbs) down - (huge thumbs) down
-- Paris Hilton - Joel David Moore - Christine Lakin

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0494652/]Welcome Home Roscoe Jenkins[/url]  -  (mild) down - (way) down
-- Martin Lawrence - Joy Bryant - Cedric the Entertainer

	---Thumbs Up Video
		--Scott:
			[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0925248/]In the Shadow of the Moon[/url]  -  2007 documentary  -  [url=http://www.amazon.com/Shadow-Moon-Charlie-Duke/dp/B000XJ5TPE/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&s=dvd&qid=1202766631&sr=1-1](amazon)[/url]
		--Roeper:
			[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0452623/]Gone Baby Gone[/url]  -  2007  -  [url=http://www.amazon.com/Gone-Baby-Casey-Affleck/dp/B0010ZR160/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&s=dvd&qid=1202766563&sr=1-1](amazon)[/url]

	---NEW ON VIDEO
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0443680/]The Assassination of Jesse James by the Coward Robert Ford[/url]  -  (hit or miss) down - (I liked it a lot) up
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0476964/]The Brave One[/url]  -  down - (big thumbs) up
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0445922/]Across the Universe[/url]  -  down - up

	---Now In Theaters
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0785007/]Over Her Dead Body[/url]  -  down
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0880578/]Untraceable[/url]  -  down
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1060277/]Cloverfield[/url]  -  up - up
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0467406/]Juno[/url]  -  (loved) UP - (loved) UP  -  ( "wonderful movie" )
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0469494/]There Will Be Blood[/url]  -  (huge thumbs) up - (huge thumbs) up  -  "unforgettable filmgoing experience"
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0477348/]No Country for Old Men[/url]  -  (huge thumbs) up - (huge thumbs) up  -  ( "best Coen brothers film since Fargo and The Big Lebowski" )

-------------------------------------------------
Siskel & Ebert and Ebert & Roeper video reviews dating back to 1985 can be found at [url=http://www.atthemoviestv.com/]atthemoviestv.com[/url]
Free [url=http://www.apple.com/podcasting/ ]Podcasts[/url] of Ebert & Roeper are available at the [url=http://www.apple.com/itunes/]iTunes Music Store[/url]
